sentences.english: Zargany has taken a leave of absence amid a dispute with the region's provincial council.
sentences.chinese: 萨尔曼省长在当地的一次省级议会上请假缺席。

sentences.english: After the war, Reich returned to Salzburg.
sentences.chinese: 战后，雷克回到了萨尔斯堡。

sentences.english: Saltillo, its capital, had grown rich exporting to America.
sentences.chinese: 其首府萨尔提略，过去曾经向美国提供大量出口品。

sentences.english: Icicles hang from a roof in Lofer, Austrian province of Salzburg.
sentences.chinese: 在奥地利萨尔茨堡的劳弗尔，冰柱挂在屋顶上。

sentences.english: Tsarist Russia in 1898, when the railway construction in the Middle East, in this set up Sarthou station.
sentences.chinese: 年沙俄修建中东铁路时，在此建立了萨尔图站。

sentences.english: The firm had a major storehouse attached to its factory in Walsall.
sentences.chinese: 该公司有一个大仓库附加到其工厂在沃尔萨尔。

sentences.english: Cesar and I had been together for two years. I loved him completely.
sentences.chinese: 我和塞萨尔在一起两年了，我毫无保留地爱着他。

sentences.english: Nisar says there were very limited investment avenues for Muslims.
sentences.chinese: 尼萨尔说，穆斯林的投资渠道非常有限。

sentences.english: Salma asks her husband when the couple get home.
sentences.chinese: 等这对夫妻回家后，萨尔玛这么问她的先生帕可。

sentences.english: Basic well pattern in eastern Nan2 area, Saertu Oilfield is the typical one.
sentences.chinese: 萨尔图油田南二区东部基础井网具有较好的代表性。

sentences.english: So now, I think I have a far better understanding of Casals’ remarks.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我也更加知道了卡萨尔斯回答中所具有的深义。

sentences.english: It is situated from Beiyu commune about 38 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 格萨尔达拉距白玉乡府所在地38公里。

sentences.english: Could you  outline China's ties with Salvador?
sentences.chinese: 请你介绍一下中国跟萨尔瓦多的关系？

sentences.english: Nicole, what kind of music was that? Samba, Salsa.
sentences.chinese: 妮可，当时是什么音乐来着？桑巴舞，萨尔萨舞。

sentences.english: Salmond has built his career on being a motivational speaker.
sentences.chinese: 萨尔蒙德由一名励志演说家开始建立自己的职业生涯。

sentences.english: The villa is one of the most luxurious of its kind.
sentences.chinese: 卡萨尔的罗马别墅是众多同类建筑中最奢华的一个。
